txt_en: You can like the life you're living. You can live the life you like.
txt_cn: 你可以热爱已有的生活，也可以去追求想要的生活。

txt_en: Promise yourself to be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.
txt_cn: 答应自己要坚强，不让任何事物烦扰内心的平静。

txt_en: The glass is full, and the sound is joyful.
txt_cn: 酒杯满满，碰响的是欢乐。

txt_en: We are from different worlds, yet we fit together.
txt_cn: 我们来自不同的世界，但我们彼此相容。

txt_en: You are the best thing that ever happened to me.
txt_cn: 遇见你是发生在我身上最美好的事情。

txt_en: Could I have some extra days off?
txt_cn: 我能多请几天假吗？

txt_en: If you are hopeful, you will be invincible.
txt_cn: 满怀希望，就会所向披靡。

txt_en: Treasured memories live and grow more precious with time.
txt_cn: 珍贵的记忆与时光同在，且日益珍贵。

txt_en: The only thing that matters is right now, this moment.
txt_cn: 唯一要紧的是现在，是此时此刻。

txt_en: Isn't laughter the best medicine?
txt_cn: 难道笑声不是最好的良药吗？

txt_en: If you care about what other people think, you're never gonna do anything.
txt_cn: 如果总是在意别人怎么想，你将一事无成。

txt_en: We get to decide what our story is.
txt_cn: 我们的故事由我们自己来决定。

txt_en: You make me want to be a better person.
txt_cn: 你让我想成为一个更好的人。

txt_en: I love you three thousand.
txt_cn: 我爱你三千遍。

txt_en: The moon lightens the dark sky while many lanterns shine bright colors on the earth.
txt_cn: 天上明月高照，地上彩灯万盏。

txt_en: You're in control of your own life!
txt_cn: 你的人生要由自己掌握！

txt_en: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
txt_cn: 亲近你的朋友，但更要亲近你的敌人。

txt_en: I'm doing better than I ever was.
txt_cn: 我已今非昔比。

txt_en: You are free to choose your own path.
txt_cn: 你可以自由地选择自己的道路。

txt_en: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
txt_cn: 你每生气一分钟，也就失去了六十秒的幸福。

txt_en: For the things that make you sad, one day, you will laugh out and say it.
txt_cn: 让你难过的事情，总有一天你会笑着说出来。

txt_en: The only thing stronger than you is you tomorrow.
txt_cn: 唯一比你更强大的是明天的你。

txt_en: Always take every opportunity that comes your way.
txt_cn: 遇到的一切机会都要抓紧。

txt_en: Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
txt_cn: 岁月使皮肤起皱，放弃使灵魂起皱。
